Package io.servicetalk.transport.netty.internal

Interface InfluencerConnectionAcceptor

All Superinterfaces:
AsyncCloseable, ConnectionAcceptor, ExecutionStrategyInfluencer<ConnectExecutionStrategy>
Functional Interface:
This is a functional interface and can therefore be used as the assignment target for a lambda expression or method reference.
@FunctionalInterface public interface InfluencerConnectionAcceptor extends ConnectionAcceptor, ExecutionStrategyInfluencer<ConnectExecutionStrategy>
A contract that defines the connection acceptance criterion.
